title: Review
description: Template for users to examine submitted information and make revisions before final submission.

frontMatter.title: Review
frontMatter.description: Template for users to examine submitted information and make revisions before final submission.
frontMatter.intro: This template enables users to examine submitted information and make revisions as needed. It implements the "check answers" pattern at the conclusion of form workflows.

when_to_use.value: **Final review.** Before users submit their form or application.
**Check answers pattern.** Implementing the check answers pattern at workflow conclusion.
**Edit capability.** When users need to modify entries before submission.

structure.intro: The Review page displays user-provided information organized by form chapter or step, with options to edit entries before final submission.

sections.title: Page Title and Subtitle
sections.description: H1 formatted as 'Review [Form name]' or 'Review application,' followed by form number.

sections.title: Progress Bar - Segmented
sections.description: Shows review as the final step in the process.

sections.title: Review Steps/Chapters - Expanded
sections.description: Bordered accordions containing form fields and user-entered values; each section includes an 'Edit' button when open.

sections.title: Review Steps/Chapters - Collapsed
sections.description: All accordions launch in collapsed state for scannability.

sections.title: Penalty Notice
sections.description: Required legal notice component for application finalization.

sections.title: Privacy Agreement
sections.description: Standard component (replaced by signature pattern for forms requiring wet signatures).

sections.title: Button Group
sections.description: Secondary 'Back' button and primary 'Submit application' button.

sections.title: Autosave
sections.description: Displays last saved timestamp via success alert.

content_guidelines.value: Organize information by form chapter or step for easy scanning.
Each accordion section should include an 'Edit' button when expanded.
Include the penalty notice before final submission.
Show last saved timestamp for user confidence.

accessibility.value: Accordion sections must be navigable by keyboard.
Edit buttons must have clear accessible labels indicating what they edit.
Success alerts for autosave should be announced to screen readers.
